1: I look up[c] toward you, the one enthroned[d] in heaven.
2: Look, as the eyes of servants look to the hand of their master, as the eyes of a female servant look to the hand of her mistress,[e] so our eyes will look to the Lord, our God, until he shows us favor.
3: Show us favor, O Lord, show us favor! For we have had our fill of humiliation, and then some.[f]
4: We have had our fill[g] of the taunts of the self-assured, of the contempt of the proud.
